name: com.spacemouse.unity-plugin
description:
Professional SpaceMouse plugin for Unity with feature parity to 3Dconnexion's official Windows plugin.

Features:
• 6DoF navigation modes: Object, Camera, TargetCamera, Fly, Helicopter, Walk, Drone
• HorizonLock & RotationLock toggles
• MoveObjects mode with Local/Parent/World/Camera coordinates
• Unity Preferences panel with speed settings and axis inversion
• SceneView overlay with mode indicators and quick controls
• Radial menu system with JSON configuration
• Button mapping profiles with ScriptableObject assets
• Macro system for command sequences
• Full Unity 2022+ LTS support with UIToolkit
